pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Yi2 dong4 Tong1 xin4

definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
to move/to shift/to change/to alter/to remove
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random

sentences.english: In the second part, the macro-environment of China's mobile telecommunication industry is studied.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分對中國移動通信產業的宏觀環境進行了分析。
